Reviews.Title: A High-powered Bargain for the Computer-Savvy
Reviews.Author: C. Cone "book collector"
Reviews.Content: As one of the many making the transition from Windows XP to Windows 7 and a new computer, I did my research carefully, and this sounded like a special bargain, It has a solid State hard drive, and comes with Win 7 and 8.1/ It has a nice sleek case, and various bells and whistles like an optical (CD) drive in the notebook, fingerprint ID, and more.  the only drawback so far is that it comes with zero  help in getting started and installing the various programs. the "Getting Started" booklet that came with it only has pictures and identifies what all the slots are for. I had to download a 17-page booklet from Microsoft on how to upgrade from Windows XP to a new computer and Windows 7. There was no boot screen on the new computer.I called HP anad got a technician on "Live chat" and he determined that the bios was defective. within 2 days I received a shipping box and prepaid label, sent it back, and in less than a week had the computer back again all repaired and with Windows 7 installed.. I still think it's a bargain, and I'm sure I will love it. Try Google for good instructions on the switch from XP to Win. 7.

Reviews.Title: Still waiting!
Reviews.Author: Joseph K Prince
Reviews.Content: The laptop HP I purchased failed to serve me as of this day.  It locked up on me when I tried using it and I had to return it.I am waiting for a replacement and my patients and clients are left short of help.Dr. Joseph Prince.

ProductInfo.Features:
Genuine Windows 7 Professional 64-Bit; Intel Core i3-4000M 2.4GHz 4th Gen Haswell CPU
15.6" diagonal LED-backlit HD anti-glare (1366 x 768); Intel HD Graphics 4600; VGA; HDMI
256GB Solid State (SSD) Performance Hard Drive; 16GB DDR3L 1600MHz SDRAM (2 Dimm)
802.11b/g/n & Bluetooth 4.0; 720p HD Webcam & Dual Array Microphone; DTS Sound+
Full-sized, spill-resistant keyboard; 2 USB 3.0, 2 USB 2.0; Gigabit LAN; 1 Year HP Warranty
ProductInfo.Name: HP ProBook 450 G1 Series 15.6" Dual Core Windows 7 Professional Business Notebook PC (256GB Solid State Performance Drive & 16GB RAM)
